cc.movabletype

Interface PieceMovableType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChineseCharCompositeMoveabletype
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PieceMovableTypeTzu, PieceMovableTypeWen

    public interface PieceMovableType
extends ChineseCharCompositeMoveabletype
    物件活字的介面。把活字的資訊全部集中在同一個物件上（Piece，RectangularArea型態 ），方便函式傳遞與使用，而且物件上也有相對應操縱的函式。

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SeprateMovabletype getPiece()
      取得物件活字

      • Methods inherited from interface cc.movabletype.ChineseCharCompositeMoveabletype

        adjust, print

        物件活字
